name: Bortor!!
wishText: Another year of being absolutely awesome—cheers to you! 🥳 May your day be filled with all the little things that make you smile. You deserve the world and more because you’re the kind of friend who makes everyone’s world brighter! 😊
text4: But i wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it NOW!!!!!!!!!!!!!
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again😊
